meanings.definition: Not involving anyone or anything else; only.
meanings.sent1: The decision was solely mine to make.
meanings.sent2: She was solely responsible for the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat's solely black fur made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His solely focused determination led him to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent5: The diamond's sparkle was solely captivating.

meanings.definition: To the exclusion of all others; only.
meanings.sent1: He solely wanted to watch the movie alone.
meanings.sent2: They solely focused on completing the task before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel solely hoarded nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter solely echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse solely guided ships safely to shore.
